If you wish to use drag and drop, you can work around this limitation by opening UAC (User Account Control) from the Start Menu and selecting the third level, and restarting Windows. Otherwise, you can keep using Files without drag & drop.

StatusCenter_ProcessedItems_Header.crowdinContext: Shown in a StatusCenter card. Used as "8/20 items processed"

OpenOnStartupDisabled: The option to open Files on Windows Startup is not available due to your system settings or group policy. To re-enable, open the startup page in Task Manager.
FailedToRestore: Failed to restore items from Recycle Bin
FailedToSetBackground: Failed to set the background wallpaper
GitDeleteBranchSubtitle: Are you sure you want to permanently delete "{0}" branch?
ErrorApplyingTagContent: 標籤目前只相容 NTFS格式的磁碟機。
ErrorApplyingTagTitle: 套用此標籤時發生錯誤
DecompressArchiveHereSmartDescription: Extract items from selected archive(s) to current folder for single-item archive, or to new folder for multi-item archive
ScrollToPreviousFolderWhenNavigatingUp: 向上瀏覽時捲動到上一個資料夾
HigherPermissionsRequired: 編輯 "{0}" 需要額外權限
BackgroundRunningNotificationBody: Files 正在背景執行以提升啟動速度
TilesViewSizeInfo: Additional sizes are not yet available for the Tiles View.
RestoreDefaultKeybindingsConfirmation: Are you sure you want to restore the default key bindings? This action cannot be undone.
KeybindingAlreadyUsedNotification: This key binding is already being used, please choose a different key binding to continue.
KeybindingInvalidKeyNotification: The key binding you choose cannot be used, please try again using a different key binding.
AdaptiveLayoutDisabledNotification: Adaptive layout is not available when preferences are synced, the default layout has been changed to Details.

ThinAcrylic.crowdinContext: This is a type of backdrop for the application background

AllLocations.crowdinContext: Setting where users can choose to display "Open IDE" button for Git Repos

DisplayOpenIDE: Configure the "Open IDE" button on the status bar

GitRepos.crowdinContext: Setting where users can choose to display "Open IDE" button for all locations.

ApplicationExtension.crowdinContext: This is the friendly name for DLL files.

IcoFileCapitalized.crowdinContext: This is the friendly name for ICO files.

NoNetworkLocationsInfo: There are no network locations. If you don't use network locations, you can disable the widget.
EditInNotepadDescription: Edit the selected file in Notepad

ShowToolbar.crowdinContext: Setting that controls if the Toolbar is shown in the main view

ShowTabActions: Show tab actions button in the title bar
